body.p: Paragraphs 29–31 of IAS 1 set out requirements relating to materiality and aggregation of information. Examples of aggregation bases that might be appropriate for information disclosed about insurance contracts are:

li.p: type of contract (for example, major product lines);
geographical area (for example, country or region); or
reportable segment, as defined in IFRS 8 Operating Segments.
